title: Valet trash service, Granite countertops, Walk-in closets
posting_body: Use the link below for more details:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1219 Sq.
Welcome home to The Ranch at First Creek, an apartment community where residents enjoy the comforts of home along with the amenities of an exclusive resort.
Now’s your opportunity to enjoy a luxurious lifestyle with unparalleled access to the surrounding Denver area.
Our spacious and pet-friendly one-, two-, and three-bedroom open-concept floor plans feature rustic modern design elements and amenities.

Every sophisticated apartment home features expansive 9’ ceilings, distinctive wood-style flooring, stainless steel appliances, oversized walk-in closets, a private balcony or patio, an in-unit washer/dryer, and so much more.

the Ranch at First Creek provides its residents with an abundance of exceptional community amenities, including a resort-style pool and spa, a professional-grade fitness center, an outdoor lounge with a fireplace, BBQ grills, and plenty of space to entertain friends and family.

Located less than 30 minutes from Downtown Denver and 15 minutes from Denver International Airport, The Ranch at First Creek’s central location puts you in close proximity to the area’s best dining, shopping, entertainment, and recreational activities.
Surround yourself with friends and family.
There is a one time fee of $300 and breed restrictions apply.
